comments:
Datasource has name and its type, and the latter is necessary. There is a 
problem in your code.

OdaDataSourceHandle datasourceHandele = reportDesignHandle.getDataSources( )
					.getElementHandle( )
					.getElementFactory( )
					.newOdaDataSource( datasourceName);//, 
datasourceType );

You should change it to:

OdaDataSourceHandle datasourceHandele = reportDesignHandle.getDataSources( )
					.getElementHandle( )
					.getElementFactory( )
					.newOdaDataSource( datasourceName, 
datasourceType );
This bug has been verified in build 20051013
